name: Game Feel Week 4
description:
Recommended To Be Played In Full Screen

List of the things I changed, added and fixed:
- Altered the transition between the start menu and the game itself (animation with camera zoom to move into the next scene)

- Fixed the menu screen so it now no longer has the menu icons move in front of the seperate menus, also moved the icons around and changed their sizes to make more sense as a starting menu and fixed the volume mixer, which now works.

- Added particle effects (jumping, killing an enemy, falling for a long time and landing)

- Added sound effects (falling at the start and crashing on the ground)

- Made the text on the menu buttons more readable and better looking

- Made the Quit option in the pause menu bring you back to the main menu

Small note: There are no animations in the in-game pause menu on purpose, they wouldn't work because if you press pause (esc) the whole game time would be paused, so animations don't play
